alert.note: Alert for East Bay Hills; San Francisco Bay Shoreline; San Fransisco Peninsula Coast; Santa Clara Valley Including San Jose; Santa Cruz Mountains (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued January 10 at 7:55AM PST by NWS Monterey
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of southwestern Alameda, northwestern Santa Cruz, San Mateo and northwestern Santa Clara Counties through 830 AM PST... At 755 AM PST, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from Foster City to near Boulder Creek. Movement was northeast at 50 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... San Jose, Fremont, Hayward, Sunnyvale, Santa Clara, San Mateo, Redwood City, Mountain View, Pleasanton, Union City, Milpitas, Palo Alto, Cupertino, Dublin, Newark, Campbell, Menlo Park, Foster City, Saratoga and Los Gatos. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: East Bay Hills; San Francisco Bay Shoreline; San Fransisco Peninsula Coast; Santa Clara Valley Including San Jose; Santa Cruz Mountains
